Madge Evans https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Madge_Evans 0 Madge Evans (born Margherita Evans, July 1, 1909 – April 26, 1981) was an American stage and film actress. She began her career as a child performer and model. Madge_Evans ( born Margherita_Evans , July_1_,_1909 – April_26 , 1981 ) was an_American_stage_and_film_actress . She began her_career as a_child_performer_and_model .
